{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    bt = ft.ElevatedButton(
        text="登録",
        color=ft.Colors.RED,
        bgcolor=ft.Colors.YELLOW,
        width=80,
        height=40,","
    )","
    page.add(bt)
ft.app(target=main)
"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    icon_bt = ft.IconButton(
        icon=ft.Icons.CHECK_BOX,
        icon_color=ft.colors.GREEN,
        icon_size=30,
        bgcolor=ft.Colors.YELLOW,
        width=50,
        height=50","
    )","
    page.add(icon_bt)

ft.app(target=main)
"],"caption":[]}
